components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to BSNL Network in India

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to India BSNL Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: Proxy scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Maintenance activity: We would be updating the Proxy database version in the US1 region. There are pre and post activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window of 1.5 hours. The actual database version upgrade, however, is expected to be take approximately 3 minutes. 

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Proxy

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 March 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 27 March 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging  (Messaging Channels) and Verify - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 to 20:30 PDT on 04/02/2025. During the maintenance window, customers will experience the following issues with WhatsApp, RCS, and Facebook Messenger:

- Message delays: Inbound and outbound messages may be delayed by up to 5 minutes.
- Outbound message failures: Messages with a validity period of less than 100 seconds may fail with error code 30036.
- Sender management issues: Creation, updates, or deletions of senders may fail during this window and will need to be retried afterward

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Messaging Channels
ACCOUNT SECURITY - Verify

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 to 20:30 PDT on 04/02/2025. During the maintenance window, customers will experience the following issues with WhatsApp, RCS, and Facebook Messenger:

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the TaskRouter database version in the US1 region. There are pre and post activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window. The actual database cut-over is expected to take approximately 3 minutes and would incur a downtime of less than 1 minute.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 00:00 PST
12 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 13 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
19 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 20 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
26 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice. We are working to provide earlier notification where possible.
